QuestData.Title: A Sister's Pledge
QuestData.Description: Please, $n. I know it is Arugal you're after. I swear on my father's memory I will help you take him down.$B$BBut I must beg you... Anya is completely innocent, we cannot leave her with these savages.$B$BHelp me rescue my sister and you'll have me at your side when you face Arugal.$B$BI know the den Anatoly spoke of. We'll find it on the other side of this hill. Let's go, my sister's in danger.
QuestData.LogDescription: Look for Anya in the Duskhowl Den near Solstice Village.
QuestData.RewardText: I don't want to be here anymore. The worgen-men are mean.
